title: How much Crit chance and attack speed should I be building as an ADC
body:
I play Sivir as my main ADC and I almost always find myself building the same .. infinity edge, static shiv, boots, last whisper, blood thirster and maybe some defensive item or more damage/ attack speed ..  but apart form the boots and the shiv I don't really have a lot of attack speed and the same with crits .. should I be building more items that boost my crit chance? or attack speed? or is this fine? I know that some ADC's build differently but I always find myself building very similar items every game, compared to pretty much any other lane where I feel like I can change up my build a lot to suit the game.. is it ok to branch out and buy different items as an ADC or will I suffer because I don't have the max AD or such like? 
Thanks :)

replies.body: the most efficient and common runepage for every adc is AS quints AD reds ARM yellows and MR blues. the safest change to this is switching out 2-3 blues for scaling MR, otherwise, besides ARM pen reds, you can run that on every adc

sell Shiv late game for a Phantom dancer and maybe sell your boots late game if u don't need it for a Trinity force (i don't think trinity force has much synergy with sivir tho). Other that that your build looks perfectly fine and if u want to crit more often just ask your support to buy a {{item:3050}}.

So why would you suggest Trinity Force then..................................

Although she does actually have synergy since W gives her an extra effect on her next auto.

> [{quoted}](name=Olee,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=aRlnzsQe,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-09-22T11:02:08.438+0000)
>
> So why would you suggest Trinity Force then..................................
> 
> Although she does actually have synergy since W gives her an extra effect on her next auto.

Because it has a movespeed multiplier which is a good substitute to your shoe and gives some AD and AS and the rage passive helps you with kiting. Extra Health to survive a little longer and mana for boomerangs and extra crit chance to increase your frequency of crits. Overall its a good item and is definitely a lot better than your shoe so why not sell your shoe when you are really rich.

Okay, so now you're saying it HAS a lot of synergy with her? I'm not saying it doesn't I'm saying it does. I'm just commenting on the fact that you suggested the item and then said it doesn't have a lot of synergy with her and now you're saying it does lmao. wat.

Maybe it just doesn't have as much synergy with Sivir as it does with other ADCs like Ezreal? It's still worth mentioning cause OP said ADCs, not specifically Sivir. Just that they play Sivir.
On paper it sounds like it works with Sivir to me, although I don't know if she has AP scalings at all that'd benefit? Still worth swapping for boots end game I'd say.
Or if you didn't get Zephyr that's an option too

No it is good. W is technically an  on hit proc. And she doesn't benefit from spamming shit and can afford to space abilities out for the Sheen procs plus her passive plus Phage passive makes kiting easier.
its a good item you can build it on any adc if you want, thats really what he meant, its just theres better things to spend your money on to do more damage all around

Thanks for your help guys. It is interesting to look at your build ideas. especially the use of trinity force and swapping out the last whisper for black cleaver. I also want to try out the 3 attack speed items you suggested (shiv, PD and zephyr) :)

around 60-75% crit and 1.40-2.50 aa speed with around 350-500 damage with 30-35% armor pen

a good build that includes all these stats consists within:
{{item:3031}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3172}} {{item:3035}} 

It may seem unorthodox, but its actually very useful, especially if you swap the {{item:3035}}  for a {{item:3071}}  on people like mf, who benefit from it a lot, it might actually be good on sivir as well because it applies speed from using boomerang.
